Description_lang: Your damaging spells and abilities have a chance to apply Deathly Fixation to your target, dealing $322253s1 Shadow damage over $322253d and stacking up to 5 times. Upon reaching 5 stacks, Deathly Fixation explodes, dealing $322256s1 Shadow damage to the target. If you consume this potion while your weapon is augmented with Shadowcore Oil, the explosion damage is increased by $s2%. Lasts $d.
AuraDescription_lang: Chance to apply Deathly Fixation to your target.
